thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Cyndi Bishop
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Cyndi Bishop

author: Cyndi Bishop
title: Cyndi Bishop
text: I found what I wanted and it was paid for and mine in less than a minute. So easy to use. I don't usually like a lot of emails trying to sell me things but the email about the red tag sale and what I already had saved in my list was just what I needed. Very timely - and that item is now mine! Very happy.
